fixes.name: MTM Stress T (In CAD)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM Stress (in CAD)],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = EndDateParam,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM Stress (in CAD)],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau nested IF logic into DAX using VARs for parameter values (SELECTEDVALUE for each parameter) and IF() for conditional branches. All column and calculated field references were transformed to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName] format. Parameters were mapped to SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) as required.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
